page.shortlink: api desktop api object class prev function
page.description: Moves to the previous control as defined by the tab order.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.PREV() method moves the focus to the previous control in the tab order as if the user had pressed the Shift Tab key.
